name: Toddler Play Group
description: The toddler play group is for children from 1.5 to 4 years old. The purpose of the play group is to prepare the children for pre-school/kindergarten. - This is offered in the Fall (October-December) and Spring (January-May). - Gatherings are held on Thursdays from 10am-11:30am. - No tuition will be collected.
